definitions.definition: The infinitive mood or mode (a grammatical mood ).

A non- finite verb form considered neutral with respect to inflection; depending on language variously found used with auxiliary verbs , in subordinate clauses , or acting as a gerund , and often as the dictionary form .
A verbal noun formed from the infinitive of a verb.

main_definition: ( grammar ) The infinitive mood or mode (a grammatical mood ).
secondary_definitions: ( grammar ) A non- finite verb form considered neutral with respect to inflection; depending on language variously found used with auxiliary verbs , in subordinate clauses , or acting as a gerund , and often as the dictionary form .
( grammar ) A verbal noun formed from the infinitive of a verb.
